name: .ATTHEME File Extension
summary: Learn about .ATTHEME files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open ATTHEME files with the Android version of the Telegram app. Telegram's built-in theme editor on Android also allows you to adjust themes. There are also several online theme editors, including .attheme editor, that can open and modify your theme properties.

Since ATTHEME files are saved in a plain text format, you can open and edit them with a basic text editor, such as Microsoft Notepad (Windows) or Apple TextEdit (Mac), or a source code editor. However, it's safer and more convenient to create and adjust themes in ATTHEME files with Telegram's built-in theme editor on Android.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
